# TextSerializer&lt;TTargetType&gt;.SerializeArray method

Serializes a collection of TargetType objects to the given TextWriter.

```csharp
public void SerializeArray(TextWriter writer, ICollection<TTargetType> records)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| writer | Writer to output serialized data to. |
| records | Collection of TargetType objects to serialize to. |
